name: Where in Hyrule are We?  3 Multiple Choice Quiz | Zelda Games | 10 Questions

questions.text: We've just earned our newest spell, "Farore's Wind".  Where are we?
questions.explanation:
Zora's Fountain.

	"Farore's Wind" lets us warp back to the beginning of a dungeon when it's used.

questions.text: We're standing outside the Temple of Time, but where are we exactly?
questions.explanation:
Hyrule Market.

	The Temple of Time contains the all-powerful and extremely important Master Sword.  We can warp through time in this location.

questions.text: We can now hold five hundred rupees with our useful Giant's Wallet!  Where did we acquire the object?
questions.explanation:
Kakariko Village.

	You can earn the Giant's Wallet by collecting thirty Gold Skulltula tokens and heading to the Skulltula House in Kakariko Village.

questions.text: Where are we if we've just fought Beth, Joelle, Meg and Amy?
questions.explanation:
Forest Temple.

	Beth, Joelle, Meg and Amy are the four Poe sisters we must defeat in order to advance to the basement of the Forest Temple.

questions.text: We just played the Ocarina for five frogs and they gave us a heart piece at which location?
questions.explanation:
Zora's River.

	Every time we play a different (non-warping) song, one of the frogs seems to grow, and when we finally grew all five, we got a heart piece!

questions.text: We've just ridden a ship of Stalfoes!  Where are we?
questions.explanation:
Shadow Temple.

	We ride the Stalfo Ship in the Shadow Temple.  It leads us closer to the boss, but there's more to do first.

questions.text: In which temple are we fighting Iron Knuckles?
questions.explanation:
Spirit & Spirit Temple.

	Iron Knuckles are the big armoured guys we fight three or four times in the Spirit Temple.  After fighting one, we'll get the Mirror Shield.

questions.text: Where have we ended up if we've just received the Water Medallion?
questions.explanation:
Lake Hylia.

	After receiving the medallion from the Temple of Light, we've been sent to the top of the Water Temple on an island in Lake Hylia.

questions.text: Where are we if we just gave someone the Keaton Mask?
questions.explanation:
Kakariko Village.

	We gave the Keaton Mask to the gatekeeper on the path to Death Mountain in Kakariko Village.  He says it's for his son, but he wears it every day.

questions.text: Which is not a place we could be if we've just received a better upgrade for an item?
questions.explanation:
Zora River.

	In the Lost Woods, we got a new seed satchel for our slingshot, and at Kakariko, we can get wallets, quivers, and more.  At Hyrule Market, we can also get a better bomb bag and quiver.
